name: osasg-client
description: Client that interacts with the OSASG server.

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && browserify app_js/main.js > public/javascript/generated/bundle.js && cp node_modules/zone.js/dist/zone.js public/javascript/generated/zone.js && cp node_modules/reflect-metadata/Reflect.js public/javascript/generated/Reflect.js  && cp node_modules/reflect-metadata/Reflect.js.map public/javascript/generated/Reflect.js.map

author: djmclaugh
